scripts.title: A Good Man Is Hard to Find
scripts.text: Well, seems like this song is telling us something about the dating scene - or at least a certain woman's experience with it! Here's "A Good Man" from the one and only Cass Daley.

scripts.title: A Good Man Is Hard to Find
scripts.text: Ladies and gentlemen of the Mojave, get ready for a tune that'll have you nodding your head in agreement. Who can deny it? Finding true love is like searching high and low - only when you least expect it will a gem come into view! And here's Cass Daley with A Good Man Is Hard to Find.

scripts.title: A Kiss to Build a Dream On
scripts.text: The dreamer in me can't help but get swept up when I listen to this tune. The way those lyrics paint the picture of building hopes and desires on just one tender moment - it's like Louis is whispering directly into my heart, you know? Here's him singing A Kiss to Build a Dream On now.

scripts.title: A Kiss to Build a Dream On
scripts.text: Louis Armstrong reminds us that sometimes, the simplest gestures hold profound power in tonight's romantic ballad - just one sweet kiss can ignite imagination and inspire dreams. Here he is with "A Kiss to Build a Dream On".

scripts.title: A Room With a View
scripts.text: You know, I always wondered if the "room" in this song refers to more than just physical space - maybe it symbolizes an emotional sanctuary or private world where dreams can come true. Here's Artie Shaw with his lovely rendition of 'A Room With a View'.

scripts.title: A Room With a View
scripts.text: You know, sometimes the greatest pleasures in life can be found right next door. And that's what this timeless tune is all about - appreciating those wonderful people closest to us who make our world so bright and beautiful. It's Artie Shaw with 'A Room With A View'.
